text: The 1956 NCAA Men's Golf Championship was the 18th annual tournament to determine the national champions of NCAA men's collegiate golf. The tournament was held at the Ohio State University Golf Club in Columbus, Ohio. Houston won the team title and Rick Jones from Ohio State won the individual title over Houston's Rex Baxter Jr. ==Team competition== ===Leaderboard=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Place!!Team!!Total |- | 1 || align=left|Houston || 601 |- | rowspan=2|T2 || align=left|Purdue || rowspan=2|602 |- | align=left|West Texas State |- | 4 || align=left|Oklahoma A&M; || 605 |- | 5 || align=left|Florida State || 606 |- | 6 || align=left|Notre Dame || 607 |} ==References== Category:NCAA Men's Golf Championship Category:Golf in Ohio NCAA Golf Championship NCAA Golf Championship NCAA Golf Championship NCAA Golf Championship
